data.comment: The match is underway in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Miguel Almiron.
In the minute 1, That's a fine assist from Joelinton.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Conor Gallagher (West Bromwich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 8, Darren England signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
Darren England signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to West Bromwich's area.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Darren England signals a Newcastle throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
At St James' Park, Newcastle are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 12, West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Miguel Almiron gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 17, Filip Krovinovic (West Bromwich) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Newcastle.
Darren England signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 19, Can West Bromwich capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Newcastle defence as Karlan Ahearne-Grant fires in a strike for West Bromwich.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
In the minute 21, West Bromwich drive upfield and Semi Ajayi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
West Bromwich's Matt Phillips breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in Newcastle upon Tyne.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 26, Miguel Almiron for Newcastle drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 30, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Isaac Hayden (Newcastle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Newcastle pushes forward through Joelinton, whose finish on goal is saved.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Newcastle needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
West Bromwich have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 35, Jamal Lewis (Newcastle) gets a yellow card.
At St James' Park, Darnell Furlong has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 36, West Bromwich's Callum Robinson is whistled for offside at St James' Park.
West Bromwich are pushing forward but Conor Gallagher's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 41, Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Free kick West Bromwich.
In the minute 43, West Bromwich's Conor Gallagher misses with an attempt on goal.
Darren England awards Newcastle a goal kick.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
In the minute 45, In Newcastle upon Tyne, Branislav Ivanovic (West Bromwich) misses the target with a header.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at St James' Park.
Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
The away team replace Karlan Ahearne-Grant with Charlie Austin.
In the minute 46, Kieran Gibbs is on a sub for Callum Robinson for West Bromwich.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 47, Darren England signals a West Bromwich throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 49, Darren England signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Darnell Furlong.
Matt Phillips with an assist there.
In the minute 51, West Bromwich will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Newcastle.
Darren England awards West Bromwich a goal kick.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
In the minute 53, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Darren England signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Matt Ritchie for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Newcastle.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 56, Newcastle to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
West Bromwich drives forward and Conor Gallagher gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Charlie Austin (West Bromwich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in their own half.
In the minute 60, Darren England signals a Newcastle throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Darren England.
Newcastle's Sean Longstaff is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Darren England awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Semi Ajayi is booked for the away team.
In the minute 69, Steve Bruce is making the team's first substitution at St James' Park with Dwight Gayle replacing Jamal Lewis.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 71, In Newcastle upon Tyne, Dwight Gayle of Newcastle is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Newcastle push forward at St James' Park and Dwight Gayle gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 73, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Newcastle are caught offside.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
In the minute 76, West Bromwich are coming forward and Conor Gallagher gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 77, Darren England waits before resuming play because Dara O'Shea for West Bromwich is still down.
Dara O'Shea has recovered and rejoins the match in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Newcastle push forward at St James' Park and Miguel Almiron gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined West Bromwich defence.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
The home team have replaced Emil Krafth with Jacob Murphy. This is the second substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
Kamil Grosicki is replacing Conor Gallagher for the away team.
In the minute 81, Important block from the West Bromwich defence as Jonjo Shelvey fires in a strike for Newcastle.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of West Bromwich.
Newcastle move into a 2-1 lead through a Dwight Gayle header.
In the minute 82, Jacob Murphy instrumental with a fine assist.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
West Bromwich's Charlie Austin has run offside.
In the minute 85, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Charlie Austin.
West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle make their third substitution with DeAndre Yedlin replacing Miguel Almiron.
Charlie Austin is back on the pitch.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Branislav Ivanovic (West Bromwich) has received a yellow card from Darren England.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Newcastle.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Darren England signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
Can Newcastle capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Callum Wilson for Newcastle has been booked by Darren England and receives a first yellow card.
